name: Idle SpaceShip
description:
Click, drag and release to shoot your spaceship in the desired direction.  Defend your base in the middle by colliding with the enemy spaceships, collect money to upgrade speed, health,  money acquired, and unlock special abilities

Controls may be a bit janky but they are primarily designed for mobile, if you find any bugs or have any feed back please let me know! 

Thanks for playing :)
